author: Second Wind
description:

title: Eight Games We Loved from Steam Next Fest

author: Second Wind
description:
This video is brought to you by Wartorn, the single-player, squad-based, roguelite with deep replayability. Available now in Early Access – https://store.steampowered.com/app/1296660/Wartorn/

This week on Firelink, Marty and Nick chat about the WB restructuring their games division around four core franchises, the Gex Trilogy being literally unplayable on Switch 2, and why you should immediately play The Alters.

Keep up to date on the standings of our Firelink Fantasy Critic Draft -- https://www.fantasycritic.games/league/6093c943-c06e-4f44-8206-157e410d7914/2025

If you dig the podcast, considering supporting us over at Patreon --  https://www.patreon.com/SecondWindGroup

Check out our excellent selection of merch over at our DFTBA store -- https://store.dftba.com/collections/second-wind

Snag yourself an Adventure is Nigh! plushie over at Shark Robot -- https://sharkrobot.com/collections/second-wind
title: You Should Be Playing The Alters Instead of Watching This Podcast | Firelink Podcast
